rooms.Name: Vall's Hideout.....until he gets a 12xx room..
rooms.Description:
You have stumbled upon an old run-down shack of sorts.
Papers with strange writings on them (C, Pascal, FORTRAN, APL, ..)
are scattered throughout the room.  Against on wall is a desk with
a dusty computer on top.  On the wall is a sign which simply
reads: Vall.

Exits.Description: A gateway leads to the IMM room.
A portal leads to the Temple of Midgaard.
A slide leading to a cliff face.

ExtraDescs.Description:
Lying on the desk under a pile of dust is a Packard Bell 486SX.
(as soon as I can scrape up some money...I'll overdrive it)..:P
An old wooden desk with no drawers or anything.  Just a slab of wood.
A sign that reads: Vall.

rooms.Name: Cliff Face
rooms.Description:
A barren, rock faced cliff looms above you and stretches high into 
the air.  Gusts of wind sting your face as you notice a small ladder
leading up the side of the mountain.

Exits.Description: An intersection lies to the west.
A ladder leads up the cliff.

ExtraDescs.Description: A sign points up and reads: Newbie Plateau
A ladder leads up

rooms.Name: Beginning of the Plateau.
rooms.Description:
Thie wind dies completely here and you are left with filled with
a feeling of peace and tranquility.  Butterflies and bumblebees dance
mystically in and about the wide variety of plantlife growing on
this plateau.  Off in the distance, beyond the cliff, you can discern
the city of midgaard.

Exits.Description: An open field.
An open field.
An open field.
A ladder leads down towards home.

ExtraDescs.Description:
There is a wide variety of plants stretching out as far as you
can see, most of which are flowers.
You can just make out the city in the distance.

rooms.Name: An open field.
rooms.Description:
A field stretches out before you and meets the sky at a great
distance. The land here is quite flat and the underbrush is 
populated by various prairie creatures.  A wooded area can be seen
to the west.

Exits.Description: You see sunflowers towards the north.
The beginning of the plateau.
You see a group of trees to the west.

ExtraDescs.Description: In the distance, the ground and sky meet at the horizon.

rooms.Name: An open field.
rooms.Description:
A field stretches out before you and meets the sky at a great
distance.  The lands here is quite flat and the underbrush is 
populated by various prairie creatures.

Exits.Description: An open field.
The field continues to the east.
The beginning of the plateau.

ExtraDescs.Description: In the distance, the ground and sky meet at the horizon.

rooms.Name: An open field.
rooms.Description:
A field stretches out before you and meets the sky at a great
distance. The land here is quite flat and the underbrush is 
populated by various prairie creatures.  You evidence that
somebody has camped here recently as there are signs of a camp
and campfire.  A pleasant scent filters from the north.

Exits.Description: You see a multitude of flowers towards the north.
An open field.
The beginning of the plateau.
An open field.

ExtraDescs.Description: In the distance, the ground and sky meet at the horizon.

A circle of stones surrounds a blackened area where a
fire recently roared.

rooms.Name: An open field.
rooms.Description:
A field stretches out before you and meets the sky at a great
distance.  The lands here is quite flat and the underbrush is 
populated by various prairie creatures.

Exits.Description: You see more of the field towards the east.
An open field.
An open field.

ExtraDescs.Description: In the distance, the ground and sky meet at the horizon.

rooms.Name: Windswept field.
rooms.Description:
The wind stings your face for a moment and then subsides
to become a slight breeze which tickles your neck.  Small
animals scurry around and search for food and shelter.

Exits.Description: You see a large tree in the distance.
You see the edge of the plateau towards the east.
The field continues to the south
An open field.

rooms.Name: Willow on the plateau.
rooms.Description:
There is a steady breeze that blows through an aged willow
tree which stands solitaire upon this vast plateau.  The tree
seems to be a gathering place for the various creatures of
this plateau.  It stands relentlessly against the passage of
time and provides many of the creatures gathered here with a 
sense of security.

Exits.Description: Saplings grow towards the east.
You see an expanse of fields towards the south.
More open field to the west.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The tree is a sign of stability in an otherwise changing world.
Animals wander in and around the large tree and eye you with
curiousity.

rooms.Name: Field.
rooms.Description:
The field topped plateau continues here with the underbrush
getting slightly higher.  As a result the animals which
wander here are more concerned with their safety as predators
are harder to avoid.  The air is sweetly scented towards the
west.

Exits.Description: More field.
More fields.
You smell something sweet from the west.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The underbrush allows some animals a better defense against would
be predators.

rooms.Name: Flowers in the field.
rooms.Description:
As you come upon this drastically different part of the field,
you notice a sweetness hovering in the air.  The birds and other
animals roaming throughout this flowery field seem to be engulfed
in a sort of jovial atmosphere.

Exits.Description: More field.
The field continues to the south.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The flowers here dance brilliantly and almost force you to
think of happier times.

rooms.Name: Entrance to Prairie
rooms.Description:
The plant life starts to thin out as you come upon a
prairie full of small mammals running this way and that.
The ground is amazingly flat here and the brownish color
of the plantlife indicates a lack of rainfall.

Exits.Description: The prairie continues to the north.

rooms.Name: Prairie
rooms.Description:
The prairie continues to stretch off in all directions and you
observe the many birds flying overhead.  Some have landed
in search for food.

ExtraDescs.Description: Birds fly overhead and search for food.

rooms.Name: Prairie
rooms.Description:
The prairie continues to stretch off in all directions and you
observe the many birds flying overhead.  Some have landed
in search for food.

Exits.Description: You see a mound of brush to the east.
You see sunflowers to the south.

ExtraDescs.Description: Birds fly overhead and search for food.

rooms.Name: Prairie
rooms.Description:
The prairie continues to stretch off in all directions and you
observe the many birds flying overhead.  Some have landed
in search for food.

ExtraDescs.Description: Birds fly overhead and search for food.

rooms.Name: Entrance to abandoned hut.
rooms.Description:
You stand before an old, abandoned hut.  The holes scattered
throughout the thatch roof indicate that it has been years
and years since somebody(or something) has inhabited it.

ExtraDescs.Description: The thatch looks as if it had been burned long ago.
The old hut seems like it has been here for ages.

rooms.Name: Abandoned Hut
rooms.Description:
You find yourself squinting to see inside this old abandoned
hut.  A table is tipped over in the corner and the chairs that
accompanied it are all but in pieces.  Other than the smell of
the rotting floorboards, there is not much else of interest
in this deserted hut.  It does, however, seem safe to rest here.

Exits.Description: A trapdoor leads down into darkness.

ExtraDescs.Description:
A destroyed table lies in the corner.  It has something resembling scratches
etched on it's surface.

The chairs hardly resemble anything of which you would normally
associate a chair as being.
Searching the floor reveals a trapdoor.

rooms.Name: Prairie
rooms.Description:
The prairie continues to stretch off in all directions and you
observe the many birds flying overhead.  Some have landed
in search for food.

ExtraDescs.Description: Birds fly overhead and search for food.

rooms.Name: Scorched Prairie
rooms.Description:
This part of the prairie has been scorched by something LARGE.
The burnt plantlife looks to have been burnt recently, as 
you can still smell the carbon hanging in the air.

Exits.Description: You see a dying prairie to the west.

rooms.Name: Prairie
rooms.Description:
The prairie continues to stretch off in all directions and you
observe the many birds flying overhead.  Some have landed
in search for food.

ExtraDescs.Description: Birds fly overhead and search for food.

rooms.Name: Prairie of death
rooms.Description:
The look and feel of this part of the prairie is of decadence.  A
stillness has seemingly swallowed up this entire area as you
stare at the desolation.

rooms.Name: Prairie of death
rooms.Description:
The look and feel of this part of the prairie is of decadence.  A
stillness has seemingly swallowed up this entire area as you
stare at the desolation.

Exits.Description: You see a large burn mark in the prairie to the east.

rooms.Name: Prairie of death
rooms.Description:
The general feel of this part of the prairie is unnerving.  You can 
pinpoint why, but it seems as if you are being watched.  The edge of
the plateau lies to the west here overlooking a road directly below.
You can also just make out the city of midgaard in the distance.

rooms.Name: Prairie of death
rooms.Description:
You have come to a dead end.  The prairie is encapsuled by stone
walls that jut up out of the ground and disappear into the sky.
The peculiarly smooth surface of the rock face makes it impossible
to climb up.  Dead animals litter the ground here and the smell of
death is nearly overcoming.  A strong smell of carbon eminates from
the slick stone walls.
The only exit is back the way you came from.

rooms.Name: Up the Willow Tree
rooms.Description:
You find yourself among the branches of a giant willow tree.
From here you can see across the whole of the plateau.  You spot
a small building far to the southwest and more jagged cliffs to 
the northwest.  The wind feels refreshing up here as it blows
through your hair.

rooms.Name: Out on a Limb
rooms.Description:
You have made your way out onto a thick branch of the willow
tree.  You dare not go out any farther else you fall out of the
tree and break your neck.

rooms.Name: Prairie Trees
rooms.Description:
You have stumbled upon a grove of trees that nearly encircle 
you.  There is no exit north or south, but you think you could
move some of the branches to the east out of the way to 
allow you passage in that direction.  You can also return to the
prairie to the west.

Exits.Description: The flatlands lie to the east.
The entrance to the prairie is to the south.

ExtraDescs.Description: The trees seem to have eyes and their branches hang low to the ground.

rooms.Name: Dead tree in the Flatlands
rooms.Description:
Dry, cracked earth stretches towards the south and east.  Hardly
any plantlife grows here as the ground is just too infertile.  A lone
withered tree stands here, struggling to survive.

rooms.Name: Flatland
rooms.Description:
Dry, cracked earth stretches out as far as you can see.  Small
animals wander around here looking for shelter and food.

rooms.Name: Flatlands
rooms.Description:
You are in a vast flatland area.  The ground is cracked from the 
dryness and you can see for miles towards the north and east.
Tree branches hang low towards the west and south, but you
think you could move the western branches out of the way to 
allow you passage in that direction.

Exits.Description: The prairie lies to the west.

rooms.Name: Flatland
rooms.Description:
Dry, cracked earth stretches out as far as you can see.  Small
animals wander around here looking for shelter and food.

Exits.Description: Stone stairs lead up a bridge.

rooms.Name: Dried up pond
rooms.Description:
You stumble upon what seems to be a dried up pond.  The blazing sun
that dominates the skies above these flatlands has cracked the
now dark brown bottom of the dried up pond.  You notice a bridge that
arches overhead is gradually deteriorating.

rooms.Name: Flatland
rooms.Description:
Dry, cracked earth stretches out as far as you can see.  Small
animals wander around here looking for shelter and food.

Exits.Description: Stone stairs lead up an aged stone bridge.

rooms.Name: Flatland
rooms.Description:
Dry, cracked earth stretches out as far as you can see.  Small
animals wander around here looking for shelter and food.

rooms.Name: Flatland
rooms.Description:
Dry, cracked earth stretches out as far as you can see.  Small
animals wander around here looking for shelter and food.

rooms.Name: Flatland
rooms.Description:
Dry, cracked earth stretches out as far as you can see.  Small
animals wander around here looking for shelter and food.

rooms.Name: Dark Pit
rooms.Description:
You have stumbled upon a darkened pit.  The air here is stagnant
and you find it increasingly difficult to even breath.  There is a
broken sign attached to one side of the pit.  Luckily there is a
ladder leading out of the pit, back to the hut.

Exits.Description: A trapdoor leads up.

ExtraDescs.Description: An old sign attached to the wall reads: BEWARE OF THE TUNNEL RUNNERS!!!
A ladder leads up into the hut.

rooms.Name: Beginning of Canal
rooms.Description:
You are wading through a canal that is just about up to your chest
in depth.  The water has a murky brown texture and coloring to it which
is far from the crystal-like qualities of the water in the pool to the
south.  The wind here is non-existant, therefore there are no ripples
on the surface of the water except those created by you.  The banks on
either side of the canal are indeed too steep to climb up which forces
you to chose north or south as your exits.

ExtraDescs.Description: The water has a brown stagnate quality to it.
The banks are too steep to climb up out of canal by.

rooms.Name: Center Isle
rooms.Description:
You find yourself ashore in the middle of the large pond.  The island
on which you stand is really just a mound of sand with sparse plantlife
sprouting out of it.  There is an old sign staked into the ground here.

ExtraDescs.Description: A sign simply reads: CENTER ISLE

rooms.Name: Abrupt end of pleasant road
rooms.Description:
The cliff swings north and the road ends abruptly.  It seems almost
as if the road runs directly into the cliff, but after searching
the cliff you find nothing else abnormal about it.  The only direction
to travel is south as the dense forest blocks passage east.

Exits.Description: The road continues in this direction.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The cliff blocks all passage north and there doesn't seem
to be any way around it as the forest grows tight against it.

rooms.Name: Along the pleasant road
rooms.Description:
The road continues north and south here.  The same features that
accompany it elsewhere are apparent here as well.

Exits.Description: You think you see a cliff intersecting the road to the north.
You see a fallen tree to the south.

rooms.Name: Tree in the pleasant road
rooms.Description:
Across the middle of the road lies a tree that looks to have been
recently chopped down.  A broken axe lies embedded in the trunk of
the downfallen tree.  The forest continues on the eastern side of
the road, while the cliff looms above you on the western side.

Exits.Description: The road continues to the north.
A bend in the road towards the south

rooms.Name: Bend in pleasant road
rooms.Description:
The road swings to the north here as the cliff has also turned in that
direction. Trees grow so dense as to not allow passage south or east.

Exits.Description: You see a downfallen tree north of here.
The road continues in this direction.

rooms.Name: Along the southern pleasant road
rooms.Description:
The road is shadowed here by the large cliff to the north.  As you
stare up at cliff you can just make out some trees growing on top of it.
The road continues east or west from this point.

Exits.Description: You see a bend in the road towards the east.
The road continues in this direction.

rooms.Name: Southern pleasant road
rooms.Description:
The road here heads east and west.  A large cliff borders the road
on the north side and dense forest lies to the south.

Exits.Description: The road continues in this direction.
The road bends towards the west.

rooms.Name: Turn in the pleasant road
rooms.Description:
Here the road swings east and heads off in that direction towards
the horizon.  Small animal tracks can be seen in the light dust
layer covering the road.  Wagon ruts are evident as well.

Exits.Description: The road swings to the north.
The road continues to the east.

rooms.Name: Along the pleasant road
rooms.Description:
Just south of an intersection with a small trail, this part of
the pleasant road is quite dusty.  Wind whips here forcing you to cover
your eyes slightly.  Dense forest grows on either side of the road here
as well.

Exits.Description: An intersection lies to the north.
You see a curve in the road to the south.

rooms.Name: North end of pleasant road
rooms.Description:
You come to the end of the road.  The forest has completely blocked
off all passage further in any direction but where you came from.
The wind gently sways the very tops of the trees here.

Exits.Description: The road continues to the south.

rooms.Name: Dwindling road
rooms.Description:
You continue to follow the peaceful road, however it seems the
farther you go, the more the forest encloses it.  Plantlife is
starting to grow on the road here as well.  To the north you 
see the end of the road.

Exits.Description: The road seems to end towards the north.
The road continues to the south.

rooms.Name: Along the pleasant road
rooms.Description:
You travel on a peaceful dirt road that has a few ruts from what 
looks like wagon wheels.  On the west side of the road is a small 
stream flowing with crystal clear water flowing into a small pool
of clear water.  On the east side of the road a cliff rises high
into the sky.  The road intersects a small trail south of here.

Exits.Description: The road continues to the north.
You see an intersection to the south.

rooms.Name: Saplings on the plateau
rooms.Description:
Here is a sign of nature's struggle for survival.  Numerous young tree
saplings reach for the sky while the larger trees block most of the
desperately needed sunlight.  Animals seem relaxed here and are content
to bath in the trees' cover.

Exits.Description: You see the edge of the plateau south.
You see a large willow to the west.

rooms.Name: North end of the bridge
rooms.Description:
You have came upon the north end of a bridge which looks odd considering
the surrounding landscape.  Strange markings have been scrawled on the
stone railings.  The bridge continues to the south.

Exits.Description: The center of the bridge lies to the south.
The north stairs lead down onto the flatlands.

rooms.Name: The Flatland bridge
rooms.Description:
You arrive on an aged stone bridge that has been slowly withered away
by blowing sand and other forces of natural decent.  Over the sides
you can see a dried up pond of sorts.

Exits.Description: The north end of the bridge lies to the north.
The south end of the bridge.

rooms.Name: South end of the bridge
rooms.Description:
You find yourself on the south end of a aged stone bridge that
arches over rather small lake that has dried up.  The hard stone rail
that lines the east and west side of the bridge prevents passage in
those directions.

Exits.Description: The center of the bridge lies to the north.
Stairs leading down the bridge.

rooms.Name: Under the brush
rooms.Description:
You have crawled under a mound of dense underbrush that is
a sheltering place for many prairie creatures.  You are just able
to stand up, but you are forced to hunch over.  The brush grows
very dense around here and the only exit is back the way you entered.

Exits.Description: Back to the prairie.

rooms.Name: Sunflowers in the Fields
rooms.Description:
You come upon an area of the plateau that is completely dominated
by large sunflowers.  Bumblebees and other insects dart about looking
for the days food supply, while small animals scurry about in the
underbrush.

Exits.Description: The field continues north.
The field continues to the east.
The field continues to the south.

rooms.Name: Along the edge
rooms.Description:
The edge of plateau continues here and prohibits you from travelling
east. You notice the breeze has slighty increased here making the 
grass sway more.  Over the cliff, you can see a road far below.

Exits.Description: Saplings grow towards the north.
You can follow the edge of the cliff south.
The field continues to the west.

rooms.Name: Edge of plateau
rooms.Description:
You come to the edge of ths field covered plateau.  As in so many
other places up here, creatures are engulfed with their activities
and seemingly do not take notice to your presence.  There is a very
steep cliff to the east which you cannot journey down.

Exits.Description: Th edge continues to the north.
The field continues to the west.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The cliff is too steep for passage, but you can see a road
far below.

rooms.Name: Shaded Grove
rooms.Description:
You enter an area that is nearly completely covered by the shade of
large oak trees.  The soft whisper of the leaves blowing in the wind
is quite relaxing.  The density of the woods makes travel further into
them impossible.

Exits.Description: You see a field to the east.

rooms.Name: Prosperous Field
rooms.Description:
You find yourself in the middle of a large field that supports a
variety of life forms, from hundreds of tiny insects to larger field
type animals ranging from mice to birds.  A wonderous array of flowers
dot the countryside.

Exits.Description: The field continues to the north.
You see the edge of the plateau to the east.
The field continues to the west.

ExtraDescs.Description: Mice scitter along the ground here.
Flowers of every color imaginable grow all around you.

rooms.Name: Intersection of Newbie Trail and Peaceful Road
rooms.Description:
This is a junction of a peaceful road and a trail.  The road leads north
and south, while the trail heads east and west.  You can see a large
cliff off towards the east.  Small animals scurry around, oblivious
to anything, or anybody.

Exits.Description: The road continues to the north.
A cliff lies to the east.
The road continues south.
You see a grassy area towards the west.

rooms.Name: Before the spring
rooms.Description:
The overall beauty of the scenery surrounding you is nearly breathtaking.
Tall, ageless trees tower above you as the soft soothing sound of
gurgling water can be heard from the crystal clear pool of water.  
The sparkling water pool reflects your image vividly as you contemplate
taking a drink from it.

Exits.Description: A grassy expanse lies south of here.

ExtraDescs.Description:
Huge, ageless trees that have withstanded the test of time
shade you from the heat of the day, and protect you from the cold
of the night.

rooms.Name: End of newbie trail
rooms.Description:
The trail widens here into a pleasant grassy field that is covered
with lush green grass swaying gently in the breeze.  Towards the
east, the trail intersects a road heading north and south.  Off to the
north, gurgling water can be heard.

Exits.Description: You see a shimmering pool of water to the north.
An intersection of sorts lies to the east.
The trail meanders off towards the west.

rooms.Name: Trail towards Newbie Plateau
rooms.Description:
The trail is gradually getting wider and apparently more widely used, as
the grass and weeds that grow within it are becoming more sparse.  In
the distance, you can see the dark outline of a cliff face looming
over the treetops.

Exits.Description: The trail seems to widen and get brighter towards the east.
The trail narrows a bit towards the west.

rooms.Name: Trail to Plateau
rooms.Description:
The path widens here into something that more closely resembles a trail.
The breeze that meanders through the trees is refreshing, however it
cannot hide the evidence of recent travellers that have also journeyed
upon this trail.  The air surrounding you is crisp and clean.

Exits.Description: The trail seemingly gets wider towards the east.
The trail turns into a path that heads off to the west.

rooms.Name: Path to the Newbie Plateau
rooms.Description:
You find yourself on a small dirt trail that leads off towards a high
cliff. The peaceful sounds of squirrels chittering and birds chirping
is all that can be heard.  There is a sign with arrows pointing in
two different directions just off the side of the trail.

Exits.Description: The path seems to widen towards the east.
You see the dirt road which is north of Midgaard to your west.

ExtraDescs.Description: A wooden sign reads:  <--------Midgaard  ||  Newbie Plateau-------->
